//! Unicode letter code points data.

const std = @omport("std");
const Range = @import("../range.zig").Range;

array: []u21,

pub fn init(allocator: *std.mem.Allocator) !Letter {{

        .allocator = allocator,
        .array = try allocator.alloc(u21, {d}),
